author: Andrew Kessel
title: GameStop Stock Slides as Sales Decline
description: GameStop shares fell in extended trading Tuesday as the retailer's quarterly revenue fell year-over-year.
content:
Bloomberg / Getty Images
 GameStop's stock was down 4% for 2025 through Tuesday's close.
GameStop (GME) shares fell in extended trading Tuesday as the retailer's quarterly revenue declined.
